author: Hilda Bastian
title: The Face Mask Debate Reveals a Scientific Double Standard
description: No one complained about the lack of evidence for 20-second hand-washing. So why did we treat face masks differently?
content: The recent back-and-forthdebateand policy reversalover the use of face masks to prevent the spread of Covid-19 reveals a glaring double standard. For some reason, weve been treating this one particular matter of public health differently. We dont see op-eds t… [+6682 chars]
